task.title: Adding contacts
task.shortdesc: A contact is someone you added to one or more of your groups. When you are online, by default only contacts that are also online are visible.

context.p: After you add a contact, you can start a chat with the contact or display information about the contact without searching the directory.

step.cmd: From the Contact List, tap on the group to add the contact to. The Group screen appears.
Tap the + and then tap Add Contact.
Enter some of the contact information in the search bar. Enter the name of the contact, given name first. You can also enter the first few letters of the given name. Press Search.
Tap on the contact to add.
In Nickname enter a nickname for the contact. A nickname is the name that is displayed in the Contact List. The nickname is visible only to you.
Choose a group from the Group name list if you want the contact in a different group.

taskbody.result: You added the contact to the group that you selected.
